languages.text: "Нет. Нет, достаточно крови". {n}Друкари усмехается и плавным движением пододвигается ближе.{/n} "Хотя то, что ты алчешь больше и больше, лишь укрепляет меня в моем мнении о тебе".
"No. No, enough blood." {n}Marazhai grins and steps closer in a fluid motion.{/n} "Though the fact that you are hungry for more and more only confirms my opinion of you."
languages.original_text: "Нет. Нет, достаточно крови". {n}Друкари усмехается и плавным движением пододвигается ближе.{/n} "Хотя то, что ты алчешь больше и больше, лишь укрепляет меня в моем мнении о тебе".

traits.locale_text: "No. No, enough blood." {n}Marazhai grins and steps closer in a fluid motion.{/n} "Though the fact that you are hungry for more and more only confirms my opinion of you."
"No. No, enough blood." {n}Marazhai grins and steps closer in a fluid motion.{/n} "Though the fact that you are hungry for more and more only confirms my opinion of you."
"No. No, enough blood." {n}Marazhai grins and steps closer in a fluid motion.{/n} "Though the fact that you are hungry for more and more only confirms my opinion of you."
"No. No, enough blood." {n}Marazhai grins and steps closer in a fluid motion.{/n} "Though the fact that you are hungry for more and more only confirms my opinion of you."

languages.text: “不，不必了，鲜血已经足够了。”{n}玛拉斋微微一笑，以流畅的动作欺身上前。{/n}“不过，你不断渴求更多的样子，只是进一步证实了我对你的看法。”
languages.original_text: "No. No, enough blood." {n}Marazhai grins and steps closer in a fluid motion.{/n} "Though the fact that you are hungry for more and more only confirms my opinion of you."

traits.locale_text: “不，不必了，鲜血已经足够了。”{n}玛拉斋微微一笑，以流畅的动作欺身上前。{/n}“不过，你不断渴求更多的样子，只是进一步证实了我对你的看法。”

languages.text: «No. No, basta de sangre». {n}Marazhai sonríe burlonamente y se acerca a ti con un movimiento fluido.{/n} «Aunque el hecho de que ansíes más no hace sino confirmar la opinión que me mereces».
languages.original_text: "No. No, enough blood." {n}Marazhai grins and steps closer in a fluid motion.{/n} "Though the fact that you are hungry for more and more only confirms my opinion of you."

traits.locale_text: «No. No, basta de sangre». {n}Marazhai sonríe burlonamente y se acerca a ti con un movimiento fluido.{/n} «Aunque el hecho de que ansíes más no hace sino confirmar la opinión que me mereces».

languages.text: « Non, non. Il y a eu suffisamment de sang versé, {n}déclare Marazhai dans un sourire, avant de se rapprocher d'un pas gracieux.{/n} Mais vous voir ainsi, encore {mf|assoiffé|assoiffée} de sang, ne fait que confirmer l'opinion que j'avais de vous. »
languages.original_text: "No. No, enough blood." {n}Marazhai grins and steps closer in a fluid motion.{/n} "Though the fact that you are hungry for more and more only confirms my opinion of you."

traits.locale_text: « Non, non. Il y a eu suffisamment de sang versé, {n}déclare Marazhai dans un sourire, avant de se rapprocher d'un pas gracieux.{/n} Mais vous voir ainsi, encore {mf|assoiffé|assoiffée} de sang, ne fait que confirmer l'opinion que j'avais de vous. »

languages.text: "Nein. Nein, genug Blut." {n}Marazhai feixt und rückt mit einer geschmeidigen Bewegung näher an dich heran.{/n} "Aber die Tatsache, dass Ihr immer noch mehr wollt, bestätigt nur meine Meinung über Euch."
languages.original_text: "No. No, enough blood." {n}Marazhai grins and steps closer in a fluid motion.{/n} "Though the fact that you are hungry for more and more only confirms my opinion of you."

traits.locale_text: "Nein. Nein, genug Blut." {n}Marazhai feixt und rückt mit einer geschmeidigen Bewegung näher an dich heran.{/n} "Aber die Tatsache, dass Ihr immer noch mehr wollt, bestätigt nur meine Meinung über Euch.

languages.text: 「いや。いいや、血は十分だ」{n}マラズハイはニヤリと笑い、流れるような動きで近づいてくる。{/n}「お前がもっと、もっとと飢えているという事実は、お前に対する俺様の評価を裏付けるだけだが」
languages.original_text: "No. No, enough blood." {n}Marazhai grins and steps closer in a fluid motion.{/n} "Though the fact that you are hungry for more and more only confirms my opinion of you."

traits.locale_text: 「いや。いいや、血は十分だ」{n}マラズハイはニヤリと笑い、流れるような動きで近づいてくる。{/n}「お前がもっと、もっとと飢えているという事実は、お前に対する俺様の評価を裏付けるだけだが」

languages.original_text: "No. No, enough blood." {n}Marazhai grins and steps closer in a fluid motion.{/n} "Though the fact that you are hungry for more and more only confirms my opinion of you."

languages.text: "Hayır. Bu kadar kan yeter." {n}Marazhai, sırıtarak seri bir hareketle sana yaklaşıyor.{/n} "Gerçi gittikçe daha da fazlasına açlık duyduğun gerçeği, hakkındaki düşüncemi doğruluyor."
languages.original_text: "No. No, enough blood." {n}Marazhai grins and steps closer in a fluid motion.{/n} "Though the fact that you are hungry for more and more only confirms my opinion of you."

traits.locale_text: "Hayır. Bu kadar kan yeter." {n}Marazhai sırıtarak seri bir hareketle sana yaklaşıyor.{/n} "Gerçi gittikçe daha da fazlasına açlık duyduğun gerçeği, senin hakkındaki düşüncemi doğruluyor."
